entries.meaning: (now rare, chiefly in the plural) Something that has been acquired; an attainment or accomplishment. [from 17th c.]
examples: […]  his acquirements by industrie were  […]  enriched and enlarged by many excellent endowments of nature.

entries.meaning: The act or fact of acquiring something; acquisition. [from 17th c.]
examples: […]  rules for the acquirement of a taste  […]
